question: In India the rainfall is mainlyÂ orographic. Which among the following follows the word in bold?
option1: The rainfall occurs when the moist air becomes saturate
option2: The rainfall occurs when the masses of air pushed by wind are forced up by large mountains
option3: The rainfall occurs on only one side of the mountains
option4: The rainfall is lesser in Rain shadow areas
answer: The rainfall occurs when the masses of air pushed by wind are forced up by large mountains
